title: Baba's Berry Dilemma
hook: One sunny day, Baba found herself in a berry predicament. Can she solve it with her friends' help?
moral: Sometimes asking for help and working together can solve big problems.
paragraphs: One sunny morning, Baba skipped into the garden, excited to pick fresh berries for her breakfast.
As she reached for the juiciest berry, she realized her favorite basket had a big hole. "Oh no!" Baba exclaimed, feeling puzzled.
"What's wrong, Baba?" chirped Robin, her feathered friend. Baba pouted, "My basket is broken. How can I carry all these yummy berries home now?"
Wise Mr. Owl overheard and suggested, "Let's weave a new basket using these vines and leaves." Baba's eyes sparkled with joy at the idea.
With teamwork and creativity, Baba and her woodland friends weaved a beautiful basket, perfect for carrying berries.
Baba hugged her friends, grateful for their help. "Thank you for teaching me that together we can fix anything," she beamed.

en-de.title: Baba's Beeren-Dilemma
en-de.moral: Manchmal, wenn man um Hilfe bittet und zusammenarbeitet, können große Probleme gelöst werden.
en-de.hook: An einem sonnigen Tag fand Baba sich in einer Beeren-Schwierigkeit. Kann sie es mit ihren Freunden' Hilfe lösen?
paragraphs:
An einem sonnigen Morgen, hüpfte Baba in den Garten und war aufgeregt, frische Beeren für ihr Frühstück zu pflücken.
Als sie nach der saftigsten Beere griff, merkte sie, dass ihr Lieblingskorb ein großes Loch hatte. "Oh nein!" rief Baba aus und fühlte sich verwirrt.
"Was ist los, Baba?" zwitscherte Robin, ihr gefiederter Freund. Baba schmollte, "Mein Korb ist kaputt. Wie kann ich jetzt all diese leckeren Beeren nach Hause tragen?"
Kluger Herr Eule lauschte und schlug vor, "Lass uns mit diesen Reben und Blättern einen neuen Korb weben." Babas Augen funkelten vor Freude bei der Idee.
Mit Teamarbeit und Kreativität haben Baba und ihre Waldtierfreunde einen schönen Korb gewebt, perfekt zum Tragen von Beeren.
Mama umarmte ihre Freunde und war glücklich für ihre Hilfe. "Danke, dass ihr mir gezeigt habt, dass wir zusammen alles schaffen können", strahlte sie.

en-fr.title: Le Problème de Baie de Baba
en-fr.moral: Parfois demander de l'aide et travailler ensemble peuvent résoudre de gros problèmes.
en-fr.hook: Un jour ensoleillé, Baba s'est retrouvée dans une drôle de situation avec des baies. Peut-elle la résoudre avec l'aide de ses amis ?
paragraphs:
Un matin ensoleillé, Baba a sautillé dans le jardin, toute excitée de cueillir des baies fraîches pour son petit déjeuner.
Alors qu'elle attrapait la baie la plus juteuse, elle a réalisé que son panier préféré avait un grand trou. "Oh non!" Baba s'est exclamé, se sentant perplexe.
"Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Baba?" gazouilla Robin, son amie à plumes. Baba boude, "Mon panier est cassé. Comment puis-je rapporter toutes ces délicieuses baies maintenant?"
Le sage M. Hibou a entendu et a sugéré, "Fabriquons un nouveau panier en utilisant ces vignes et ces feuilles." Les yeux de Baba pétillaient de joie à cette idée.
Avec l'aide des amis du bois, Baba a tissé un panier magnifique pour ramasser des baies.
Baba a serré ses amis dans ses bras, reconnaissante pour leur aide. "Merci de m'avoir appris qu'ensemble, nous pouvons réparer tout ce que nous voulons," dit-elle joyeusement.

id-en.hook: One sunny day, Baba found herself in a berry predicament. Can she solve it with her friends' help?
id-en.moral: Sometimes asking for help and working together can solve big problems.
id-en.title: Baba's Berry Dilemma
paragraphs:
A bright morning, Baba jumped happily to the garden to get yummy berries for breakfast.
Baba reached for the yummiest berry, when she saw her best basket had a huge hole. "Oh dear!" Baba said, feeling confused.
One day, Robin asked Baba, "What happened, Baba?" Baba made a sad face and said, "My basket is broken. Now, how will I take these delicious berries home?"
Smart Mr. Owl heard and said, "Let's make a new basket with these twisty plants and leafy bits." Baba's eyes lit up with happiness from the thought.
Baba and her woodland friends worked together and used their imagination to make a pretty basket, good for holding berries.
Mommy gave big hugs to her friends, so happy for their help. 
"Thank you for showing me that when we help each other, we can solve anything," she smiled.

en-pt.title: A Dificuldade da Baba com as Frutinhas
en-pt.moral: Às vezes, pedir ajuda e trabalhar juntos pode resolver problemas grandes.
en-pt.hook: Em um dia ensolarado, Baba se viu em uma situação cheia de frutas. Será que ela consegue resolver com a ajuda de seus amigos?
paragraphs:
Uma manhã ensolarada, Baba pulou até o jardim, animada para colher frutas frescas para o seu café da manhã.
Ao tentar pegar a frutinha mais suculenta, ela viu que sua cestinha favorita tinha um buraco grande. "Oh não!" Baba exclamou, se sentindo confusa.
"O que houve, Baba?" piou Robin, sua amiguinha emplumada. Baba fez beicinho, "Minha cestinha quebrou. Como posso levar todas essas frutinhas deliciosas para casa agora?"
O sábio Sr. Coruja ouviu e sugeriu: "Vamos fazer um cesto novo usando essas trepadeiras e folhas." Os olhos da Baba brilharam de alegria com a ideia.
Com trabalho em equipe e criatividade, Baba e seus amigos da floresta teceram uma bela cesta, perfeita para carregar as frutinhas.
A Baba abraçou seus amigos, feliz pela ajuda deles. "Obrigada por me ensinar que juntos podemos consertar tudo", ela sorriu.
